attributes.action: Change the expenses second home allowance to be an upfront £500,000-£525,000 grant for a second home in london if you live outside a 1 hour commute of london. MP's would only be entitled to one second home grant regardless of the amount of terms spent in parlaignment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £525,000 is more than enough for a two bedroomed apartment in london and this would end the second homes fiasco currently engulfing parlaignment and as many MP's spend alot of terms in parlaignment it would be cost effective. The MP's must only be able to sell the flat for another house or flat in london and must pay capital gains tax on all profit made on a property payed for by the second home allowance as any citizen would in normal walks of life.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
